mapper.sql: select a.id, a.user_id, a.sender, a.sender_sex, a.recipient, a.recipient_sex, a.create_time, a.anonymous, a.content, a.images, #{userId} as select_user_id, COALESCE(b.ans, 0) as comment_count, COALESCE(c.ans, 0) as support_count from `table` a left join (select table_id as id, count(1) as ans from `comment` GROUP BY `table_id`) as b on b.id = a.id left join (select table_id as id, count(1) as ans from `support` GROUP BY `table_id`) as c on c.id = a.id
mapper.select: where a.sender like "%"#{keyword}"%" or a.recipient like "%"#{keyword}"%" or a.content like "%"#{keyword}"%" group by a.id order by a.create_time DESC limit #{startIndex}, #{pageSize};
select count(1) from `table` where sender like "%"#{keyword}"%" or recipient like "%"#{keyword}"%" or content like "%"#{keyword}"%";
